name: DecaDare
description:
DECADARE USES UNITY'S ADDRESSABLES SYSTEM FOR SCENE LOADING - WHEN PRESSING PLAY YOU WILL EXPERIENCE A SIZEABLE LOAD TIME BEFORE THE FIRST MICROGAME BEGINS. THE NATIVE WINDOWS BUILD IS RECOMMENDED!

Welcome to the show!

On DecaDare, you’ll be presented with a series of 10-second games. Complete as many as you can before it’s over!

Up for a challenge? Try out “Endless” mode and let us know how far you get!

Controls

WASD and Space Bar control the minigames; experiment with them and find out how to win before the time is up! Escape takes you back to the main menu
